t: The*pn Lord*s reigns, let the earth rejoice; let*ld the many coastlands be glad!
Clouds*ln and thick darkness are all around him; righteousness*ld and justice are the foundation of his throne.
Fire*ln goes before him and*ld burns up his adversaries all around.
His*ln lightnings light up the world; the*ld earth sees and trembles.
The*ln mountains melt like wax before the Lord,*s before*ld the Lord of all the earth.
The*pn heavens proclaim his righteousness, and*ld all the peoples see his glory.
All*ln worshipers of images are put to shame, who*ld make their boast in worthless idols; worship*ld him, all you gods!
Zion*pn hears and is glad, and*ld the daughters of Judah rejoice, because*ld of your judgments, O Lord.*s
For*ln you, O Lord,*s are most high over all the earth; you*ld are exalted far above all gods.
O*pn you who love the Lord,*s hate evil! He*ld preserves the lives of his saints; he*ld delivers them from the hand of the wicked.
Light*ln is sown for the righteous, and*ld joy for the upright in heart.
Rejoice*ln in the Lord,*s O you righteous, and*ld give thanks to his holy name!
